title: Is automation and HR tech replacing HR? - Quora

response.answer_text: HR professionals always have their hands full with day-to-day tasks. They require a solution to reduce their workload and speed up the recruitment process. Automation and HR Tech can help HR professionals to save a lot of time so that they can focus on other components of recruitment. Automation, HR Tech, and AI have played a profound role in reshaping the concept of hiring. New technological innovations, HR has not only simplified the recruitment process but also changed the way HR works while hiring candidates. Smart technologies such as resume parser help in screening resume in bulk; ATS helps in streamlining the recruitment process. These HR tech tools efficiently manage the boring and monotonous tasks that consume the maximum time of HR professionals. Along with every innovation comes a few myths. Many HR professionals believe that AI will take up the job of recruiters. As automation will complete most of the tasks done by recruiters, recruiters feel that soon, organizations will start relying on only AI to hire candidates. But this is just a myth. The final decision of hiring a candidate will always rest with the HR manager/recruiter. Read more details at How can AI help in recruitment?

Replacing HR is not possible with the current level of automation available for sale. However, there are many ways in which HR Automation is transforming HR. This blog gives an account of how HR Automation is the gate to HR transformation. Check it out. HR transformation by HR automation - peopleHum - The people platform I hope this helps you. Cheers.
